No. 162641)} Sub : Amendment in General Financial Rule (GFR), 2017 Acceptance of electronic Bank Guarantee (e-BG) -reg: Ministry of Road transport & Highways vide letter no. NH-35014/20/2020-H dated 12.08.2022 (Annexure |) has forwarded Ministry of Finance (Department of Expenditure) OM no. F.1/4/2022-PPD dated 05.08.2022 regarding amendments in the Rule 170(i) and Rule 171(i) of General Financial Rules 2017 related to 'Bid Security and Performance Security' MoRTH has also requested all the implementing agencies of MoRTH & PWDs of States/UTs dealing with National Highways works to accept only electronic Bank Guarantee in place of physical Bank Guarantees from 31.08.2022 onwards. 2. In light of above, it has been decided to accept the 'Bid Security and Performance Security' in the form of Account Payee Demand Draft, Banker'$ Cheque or e Bank Guarantee with immediate effect: The relevant existing clauses vis-a-vis amended clauses of the Standard documents for EPC, HAM and BOT (Toll) Projects are accordingly attached at Annexure Il, Annexure III and Annexure IV respectively for necessary compliance by all concerned_ 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
